sentence: The Steelers’ biggest assets are a few superstar performers on defense: edge rusher T.J. Watt, defensive end Cameron Heyward and safety Minkah Fitzpatrick.
author: Mark Madden
title: Mark Madden: Steelers are underinvested at 3 most important positions

sentence: Though he’s still playing a secondary role behind stars such as Watt, Heyward and safety Minkah Fitzpatrick, his spot on the Steelers’ defense has potential to become longterm.
author: Chris Adamski
title: Alex Highsmith vows continued improvement for Steelers in ‘22

sentence: The Steelers gave Miami their first-round pick for 2020 to acquire Fitzpatrick after Week 2 of the 2019 season.
author: Mark Madden
title: Mark Madden's Hot Take: Instead of trading for Minkah Fitzpatrick, Steelers should have tanked in '19

sentence: “TA, he’s a great coach,” Minkah Fitzpatrick told reporters in January.
author: Ethan Sears
title: Steelers promoting Teryl Austin to defensive coordinator after Giants interview

sentence: Strong received a life sentence last May for his first-degree murder conviction in the killing of Hache and 18 years in prison, to be served concurrently, for his manslaughter conviction in the death of Kandis Fitzpatrick.
author: Maan Alhmidi
title: Police find remains of woman who went missing in 2008 after tip from killer

sentence: “[Fitzpatrick] was asked to essentially abandon his instincts and move to a strong safety role that, in the Dolphins’ scheme, was really more of a quasi-linebacker, mashing into a pile of 300-pound linemen,” Dunne wrote.
author: Allison Koehler
title: 2 Reasons Why the Brian Flores Hire Could Spell Disaster for Steelers

sentence: Especially since this is the same city that justified the Minkah Fitzpatrick trade by saying Fitzpatrick “counted” as a No.

title: Tim Benz: I'm skeptical of the Aaron Rodgers story, too. But the Steelers should be doing what was reported

sentence: If the Steelers cannot come to terms with Fitzpatrick this summer they can tag him next year at this time and could potentially save around $3 million all while controlling his rights through the 2023 season after which another long-term deal could be discussed.
author: Ray Fittipaldo
title: What the 2022 franchise tag numbers mean for Steelers' negotiations with Minkah Fitzpatrick

sentence: At 25, he has a chance to partner Minkah Fitzpatrick for years to come at safety, a position that is valued more in the AFC North with so many dynamic playmakers in Baltimore, Cleveland and Cincinnati.
author: Joe Tansey
title: Steelers' Top Players to Prioritize in 2022 NFL Free Agency

sentence: According to Spotrac, Fitzpatrick’s market valuation is four years, $61.073 million, or an average salary of $15.268 million.
author: Allison Koehler
title: Ex-Steeler Suggests Pittsburgh Is Pursuing 3-Time All-Pro Defender

sentence: According to ESPN’s Jeremy Fowler, the Steelers are interested in signing a top-tier safety to pair alongside incumbent starter Minkah Fitzpatrick.
author: DJ Siddiqi
title: Steelers Interested in Signing 3-Time Pro Bowler: Report

sentence: “The Steelers are still leaning on their defense to win now, and Mathieu next to Minkah Fitzpatrick would give them one of the league’s rangiest safety pairings.” Mathieu’s Versatility and Resume is Impressive The 29-year-old Mathieu spent the past three seasons with the Kansas City Chiefs in a versatile role, playing the safety positions while also lining up as a slot cornerback.
author: DJ Siddiqi
title: Steelers Considered ‘Landing Spot’ for 3-Time Pro Bowler

sentence: • She said a contract extension for Minkah Fitzpatrick is “very, very close to getting done.” When asked by host Andrew Fillipponi if the contract would make him the highest-paid safety in the league, Kinkhabwala said, “I expect that.” • On the prospect of signing ex-Kansas City safety Tyrann Mathieu, she said, “I have been told that ‘Honey Badger’ may not need quite as much money as I was told he needed a week ago.” Kinkhabwala went on to say that Mathieu believes “the idea of playing for Mike Tomlin is very enticing” and that “perhaps the monetary hopes and demands aren’t quite what they once were.” • Regarding current Steelers free agent safety Terrell Edmunds, Kinkhabwala says there is “still an offer on the table” for him.
author: Tim Benz
title: First Call: Multiple storylines emerge about Steelers safety position while 1 draft pick trade could impact team

sentence: The Steelers intend on changing that during the offseason, likely toward the start of training camp, when they give Fitzpatrick, 26, a T.J. Watt-like contract that will make him one of the highest-paid players at his position.
title: Gerry Dulac: Steelers want to give Minkah Fitzpatrick a big payday, but talks haven't started yet

sentence: Mathieu — who is well known for his playmaking ability, having forced 13 interceptions over the past three seasons — and Steelers free safety Minkah Fitzpatrick would form arguably the top playmaking safety duo in the league.
author: DJ Siddiqi
title: Steelers ‘Have an Interest’ in Signing Playmaking Safety
